page.title: 13INDUSTRY
page.content: {GENERAL MOTORS PARTS OPERATION} This part of General Motors operations has been in existance for three years. It is near to the motorway and the warehouse covers eighty three acres.One hundred and fifteen thousand spare parts are stored and these range from small plastic washer to a car body shell and this is marketed worldwide.In Luton,Dunstable and Germany they have a one hundred and eighty suppliers.Each day they recieve nine thousand Top Property Orders and these supplys reach their market by road. The seven hundred,or more workforce work thirty nine hours a week and they come mainly from Dunstable,Leighton Buzzard and North London. There is a great age gap ranging from nineteen to sixty five. General Motors is the supply warehouse for Vauxhalls.
